properties.areaDesc: Escambia, FL; Santa Rosa, FL; Baldwin, AL
properties.headline: Flood Advisory issued February 16 at 7:29AM CST until February 16 at 10:30AM CST by NWS Mobile AL
properties.description:
The National Weather Service in Mobile has issued a

* Urban and Small Stream Flood Advisory for...
Central Baldwin County in southwestern Alabama...
Northwestern Santa Rosa County in northwestern Florida...
Northwestern Escambia County in northwestern Florida...

* Until 1030 AM CST.

* At 727 AM CST, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to showers
and a few isolated thunderstorms. This will cause urban and small
stream flooding in the advisory area. Up to 2 inches of rain have
already fallen in some locations.

* Some locations that will experience flooding include...
Century, Jay and Bratt.

Additional rainfall of up to around 1 inch is expected over the
area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding.
properties.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood
deaths occur in vehicles.
